task.title: Making a Chase/Pursuit
task.shortdesc: This is the method in which a chase or pursuit is resolved.

step.cmd: Determine how far apart each party is.
Determine the amount of successful rolls must be made to catch up with the target.
Roll an opposed check using any skill or attribute determined appropriate for the chase/pursuit.
If the pursuer wins, they lower the number of successful rolls to catch the target by 1. If the one fleeing wins, increase that number by 1 instead.
Determine if the pursuer loses track of their target or catches up.
If they catch up, it becomes the chase is over, if they lose track, the chase is also over. If neither, return to step 3.
